page.title: 13EBENEZER LEISURE GROUPS
page.content:
{Ebenezer Church} is 50 years old in 1986. There are{Church Services} every Sunday and children attend {Sunday {School,}but other groups using the church are: {Robins}- boys 5 - 8 {Young Explorers}- girls 5-8 {Junior Brigade}- boys and girls 8 -11 {Girls' Brigade}_ girls 11 - 16 {Boys' Brigade}- boys 11 - 16 {Playgroup}- children 3 - 5 {Women's Fellowship}- for younger women {Women's Guild}- for older women {Gospel Singing Group.}A new group which sings gospel and country music. They recently raised Â£121 at their first concert in 1985 for the National Children's Home.
Annual events include a{Garden Party, {Bazaar}and a{Church Anniversary.}
